response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also provides you with significant savings compared to the market value of $10,000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget and needs, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
